transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Rajveer ji, Saloni bol rahi hu IndiaMART se, good afternoon.
Customer: Haan ji madam boliye.
Executive: Haan sir aap se discussion jo hua tha na usi ke regarding connect karna tha. To aap batao aap abhi ho free?
Customer: Haan ji. Bataiye.
Executive: Okay, aap mujhe ek apni Google Meet ki Google Meet ke liye na mail ID ek baar mujhe bata dijiye to main aapko usme share kar deti hu aur main aapka ye request kar rahi thi.
Customer: Royal fitness 76.
Executive: Ek second. Royal fitness 76?
Customer: Haan ji. @rate.
Executive: Okay, ek. Okay, okay, ek minute.

Executive: Ab aapke staff bhi available hai, right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: Maine aapko na aapke inbox mein share kiya hai mail, ek baar check kariye.
Customer: Abhi aaya nahi.
Executive: Aa jayega, ek baar refresh kar lijiye aap ek do baar.

Executive: Haan, abhi isme aapko first of all na main apni screen share karke dikha rahi hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ye aapka maine yaha pe na past lead mein hi maine filter lagaya tha India ka aur gym setup ka. To abhi aaj ki date mein abhi tak do lead mujhe kuch dikha raha hai jo sold out do se teen lead mujhe dikha raha hai.
Customer: Nahi, ye aa hi nahi rahi hai. Appear bhi nahi hui hai screen pe.
Executive: Achha, ye aapko screen pe dikhi bhi nahi hai?
Customer: Screen appear bhi nahi hui kyuki abhi ek dedh do ghante se takriban main hi system ke paas baitha hu.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Okay, to ye ye lead vaise aapke liye relevant hai according to aapka jo.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Yahi cheez to hame chahiye.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Hamare to ye appear bhi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Thik hai, ye wali lead?
Customer: Madam bilkul yahi gym setup wali hi chahiye hame. Ye sab to hamare paas appear bhi nahi hui kyuki ek dedh ghante se to khud hi system pe baitha hu.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Thik hai, ek baar aapko main isme mujhe aap bata na jaise main abhi dekhiye aapka section maine ye open kar rakha hai relevant ka hai na aur aapne usme 10 second wala filter laga rakha hai na auto refresh ka?
Customer: Haan bilkul.
Executive: Okay, to agar main jaise yaha pe aapka ye gym setup aur ye aap recent pe hi check karte honge barabar ki recent pe dikhe aap.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay, recent pe dekhte hai.

Executive: To aap isme specifically koi product bhi search kare ya fir usme refresh laga hua hai aur recent ka filter hai aur India filter laga hua hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur ye auto refresh hota rehta hai apne according hai na?
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: To ek bhi lead aapko nahi dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Achha, okay.
Executive: Abhi main aapko screen pe dikhi thi kal ek do maine uthai hai kal sham mein raat mein ek aadhi dikhi to maine uthai hai. Ye jo abhi aap bol rahe hai subah subah ye to ek bhi nahi dikhi appear bhi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Achha main ek baar na stop kar rahi hu apni screen aap ek baar present karega apni screen.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar kariye present maine stop kar diya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai, isi mein jayiyega vahi past lead wale section mein IndiaMART open karna.

Executive: Aap jis tarah se laga kar ke rakhte hai uske baad vahi mujhe dikhana, thik hai. Abhi aap isme na gym setup isko search karo aap.

Executive: Nahi yaha pe aap nahi search kariye, vo automatically ye page open kar dega. Past lead pe click karo aap. Past lead pe.
Executive: Isme aur jo niche filter rehte hai na us pe aap click karna. Isme India lagaiyega, location mein India lagaiye.
Executive: Iske bagal mein categories ka filter diya hai dekhiye. Isme aapko gym setup ka option aayega.
Executive: Bagal mein sir, haan ye. Upar upar dekhiye upar thoda.
Customer: Kaha pe? Ye?
Executive: Ye, ye dekhiye gym setup likha hua hai category mein vaha pe nahi sir, vaha pe nahi.
Customer: Ye yahi pe to click kiya tha maine.
Executive: Nahi nahi yaha pe click nahi kariye. Ye aapka location ka filter hai jaha aapne India lagaya usi ke bagal mein dekhiye category and product likha hai fir order value likha hai fir lead type.
Customer: Gym setup laga diya ji.
Executive: Niche aap jana.

Executive: Aapke paas recent mein koi lead bhi nahi dikh rahi hai. Taki main at least I am interested dikha du. Karwa du aapko.
Customer: Koi.
Executive: Aap ek baar filter hata dena zara, filter hatana aap ek baar pura. Filter hatane pe leads dikh rahi hai, cross karne se jo option haan isko cross kariye zara India wala bhi hata kar ke cross karna aap zara.

Executive: Vaha se sir click nahi hoga.
Executive: Thik hai, okay. Niche aap jana, niche jana thoda.
Executive: Abhi jo lead main dikha rahi thi isme dekho aap ye lead bina filter ke aapke paas dikhi, I am interested pe click kar dena aap do teen lead jo aapko lag rahi hai aapke liye relevant thi.
Customer: Kar diya.
Customer: Ye to karta hu madam fir bhi kuch benefit nahi hai.
Customer: Aapne kara hai ye bhi kara hai?
Customer: Haan ye bhi karke dekha I am interested pe bhi karke dekha hai.
Executive: Abhi recently bhi kara hai kya aapne ye barabar?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul. Appear hi nahi hoti main cheez ye hai. Main problem ye hai ki appear hi nahi hoti hai aur.
Hmm.
Customer: Hame appear nahi hogi to chahiye to bahut.
Executive: Achha aap mujhe is cheez ka ek baar aap by lead pe jana aap mujhe kya kuch bana kar ke video aisa kuch bata payenge kyuki main vaha pe agar unko raise karungi na ye cheeze to mujhe kuch ya to screenshot unko dalna padega ki dekhiye unke paas ye dikhi nahi hai.
Customer: Ye dekhiye. Ye dekhiye. Ye dekhiye. Seat leke extension ye kisi kaam ki nahi hai do ghante kal do hi lead hai matlab ye. Ye kya cheez hai madam ye aap khud dekho ye kya kar rahe the. Ek minute pehle ek lead hai. India India filter lagana India filter lagana aap sath.
Customer: Main lagata hu auto refresh pe bhi lagaya hua hai ye India laga diya. Do minute pehle do ghante pehle fir kal. Teen din pehle.
Hmm.
Customer: Hai hi nahi kuch lead ka flow hi nahi hai kuch.
Executive: Sir aapke specifically inhi do product ko lekar ke aisa ho raha hai ya baki sare product mein aisa hai kyuki.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul. Nahi leads pehle to leads ki flow hi nahi aa rahi mujhe 10-15 din se. Jaise leads aati thi vaise nahi aur uske baad in dono mein jo preferred leader hai usme to aa hi nahi raha kuch. Agar aap kehte ho past lead na vo show bhi nahi hoti hai yaha pe.
Hmm. Nahi vo aapke paas without filter show ho rahi hai past lead wali aapke direct bucket pe ek baar bhi nahi dikh rahi hai na aap ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Achha okay. Main aap mujhe at least kuch agar screenshot aap bhej pao jaise aapke paas na koi lead past lead mein turant reflect ho gayi aur aapke bucket pe nahi dikhi aisa kuch aap bhej paoge kya taki main raise kar du team ko kyuki raise karne ke liye.
Customer: Madam aisa kaise possible hai past lead pe to screenshot aapko bhej sakta hu ji yaha pe aap idhar lekin vo samne to jab past lead mein chale jayenge to samne to dikhega hi nahi na. Ab yahi dekh lijiye yahi jo ye suppose kijiye ye bhi nahi dikhi.
Executive: Achha ye dikhi nahi aapko?
Customer: Madam ye bhi nahi dikhi hai. Ek ghante pehle bata raha hai ek dedh do ghante se to main baitha hua hu yaha pe main gym ka kaam kar raha tha sath mein IndiaMART se bhi.
Executive: Aap ek baar na trade.indiamart.com bhi open karenge kya new incognito window ek baar kholna aap zara new incognito window.
Executive: Haan isse search karna trade.indiamart.com.
Executive: .indiamart.

Executive: Isko upar search karna aap gym setup sabse upar jo search option hai. Isme sign in mat karna abhi aapko pop up vagarah aaye sign in ka refresh kar dena bas.
Customer: Location India?
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Aap sirf setup hi search kariye service mat baniega. Service dala hua hai service mein refresh kar dena aap. Page refresh kar dijiye.

Customer: Aa hi nahi madam.
Executive: Isme abhi latest wali ye jo hai best home gym setup ye ek baar click karna aap zara. Achha achha continue aap niche jana thoda sa.
Executive: Aur dusre state ka bhi laga ke dekh lijiye koi abhi recent bhi aapko yaha pe dikh jaye. Dusra koi state laga ke dekhiye.

Executive: 7 tarikh ki dikha raha hai thik hai. Kuch nahi dikh raha vahi dikh raha hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Isme baki do state aur bache ek baar vo bhi laga ke check kar lijiye zara.


Executive: India India pe click kar do aap I think aa jayega fir. Haan sabse upar hi aapke paas option hai Kerala aur kuch dikha raha hai. UP aur Kerala. Ye bhi yesterday ki hai.
Executive: Thik hai, ek outdoor wala search kar lena aap dusri category thi uska bhi check kar lo aap outdoor ka. Outdoor gym equipment.

Customer: Second hand aane dijiye nahi to main bhi vo.
Executive: Isme ye jo dikh rahi hai one hour ago aur kuch 7 34 34 minutes ki ye ye kaisi hai aapke liye?
Customer: Nahi second hand mein kaam hi nahi karte madam.
Executive: Nahi nahi second hand nahi sabse upar I think kuch ye gym equipment nahi ye third nahi chahiye bas.
Executive: Achha okay.
Executive: Dusra state laga ke ek baar aur dekho aap.

Customer: Kuch bhi nahi madam vahi second hand.

Customer: Karnataka se ek last laga ke check lunga aap. Main unko raise kar dungi na to usme ye mention karungi sara sab check kar liya client ne. Ye bhi relevant nahi hai aapke liye treadmill belt?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi. Main iske liye preferred leader humne liya hua hai vahi nahi aa raha hai to hum fir ye treadmill belt ye vo kya karenge main to hamara kaam hi vahi un cheezon se hai.
Hmm. Achha.
Executive: Nahi kyuki equipment hai na to iske equipment mein ye bhi aata hai to isiliye pucha maine. Thik hai main usko na aapka raise kar de rahi hu ki aapke paas vaha pe leads reflect nahi ho rahi hai aur ek baar aap try ye karna ki 10 second ki jagah ek baar 5 second ka filter laga ke ek baar dekhna aap kya 5 second filter lagane se aapko visible ho raha hai kya. Matlab thodi der ke liye aap observe kar lena ek do ghante ke liye laga kar ke main baki raise to kar de rahi hu.
Customer: Main dekh leta hu.
Executive: Haan ji, main ek baar raise karti hu jo jaisa update mere paas aata hai main aapko call karke update kar dungi aur mera number jo hai main usko na aapko WhatsApp bhi kar deti hu to aap usko save kar lena further ke liye main aapko usi number se call ya WhatsApp kar lungi to aap easily mujhe WhatsApp pe bata dena agar aap free nahi honge to WhatsApp pe bhi update kar doge to main aapko bata dungi. Thik hai? Haan ji haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not appearing in the customer's bucket.

- Preferred leads not showing up.

- Customer is unable to see new leads.



Resolution:

- Executive shared her screen to show leads.

- Executive asked the customer to share his screen.

- Executive suggested trying a 5-second filter.

- Executive offered to raise the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp her number to the customer.

- Executive will call the customer with updates.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, technical issue, filters
